what_you_do: Jackie Lapin runs SpeakerTunity, the Speaker & Leader Resource Company, helping leaders, authors, coaches, speakers and entrepreneurs get booked to deliver their message on multiple platforms.
who_you_serve: Leaders, authors, coaches, speakers, and entrepreneurs looking to connect with followers and grow their audience through speaking opportunities.
social_proof: Researched hundreds of thousands of speaker lead contacts; founder of SpeakerTunity described as leading expert on getting booked; recognized at Women Rocking the Web Awards for marketing excellence.
business_focus: Connecting leaders and speakers with booking opportunities and curated speaker lead contacts across multiple platforms.
service_provided: Speaker lead research, booking strategies, speaker coaching, book marketing coaching, transformational business consulting
